description: Categorizes GNodes by their function within GridWorks

value_descriptions.TerminalAsset: An avatar for a real-word Transactive Device More Info: https://gridworks.readthedocs.io/en/latest/transactive-device.html
value_descriptions.AtomicTNode: Transacts in markets on behalf of, and controlling the power use of, a TerminalAsset More Info: https://gridworks.readthedocs.io/en/latest/atomic-t-node.html
value_descriptions.MarketMaker: Runs energy markets at its Node in the GNodeTree More Info: https://gridworks.readthedocs.io/en/latest/market-maker.html
value_descriptions.AtomicMeteringNode: Role of a GNode that will become an AtomicTNode, prior to it owning TaTradingRights
value_descriptions.ConductorTopologyNode: An avatar for a real-world electric grid node - e.g. a substation or transformer
value_descriptions.InterconnectionComponent: An avatar for a cable or wire on the electric grid
value_descriptions.World: Adminstrative GNode responsible for managing and authorizing instances More Info: https://gridworks.readthedocs.io/en/latest/world-role.html
value_descriptions.TimeCoordinator: Responsible for managing time in simulations
value_descriptions.Supervisor: Responsible for GNode actors running in a container More Info: https://gridworks.readthedocs.io/en/latest/supervisor.html
value_descriptions.Scada: GNode associated to the device and code that directly monitors and actuates a Transactive Device
value_descriptions.PriceService: Provides price forecasts for markets run by MarketMakers
value_descriptions.Persister: Responsible for acking events with delivery guarantees
